verses.roman:
vijaya ācāryera ghare se rātre rahilā
prātaḥ-kāle bhakta sabe ghare lañā gelā

synonyms: vijaya—named Vijaya; ācāryera—of the teacher; ghare—at the home; se—that; rātre—on the night; rahilā—remained; prātaḥ-kāle—in the morning; bhakta—the devotees; sabe—all; ghare—home; lañā—taking them; gelā—went.
translation: That night the Lord stayed at the house of Vijaya Ācārya. In the morning the Lord took all His devotees and returned home.
